title: Right Click Tools
description: RCT Free for SCCM was built with Client Actions, Client Tools, Console Tools and User Tools in one place. Client Actions:  allow administrators to interact with client computers without having to navigate outside of the ConfigMgr interface. Client Tools: administrators are given a number of different device property options. Console Tools: allow administrators to perform actions that are not accessible from within the console. User Tools: allow administrators to perform various Active Directory functions on specific users.
